actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a deduction for additions to a reserve for product liability losses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction to any taxpayer engaged in the manufacture, importation, distribution, lease, or sale of any product for contributions to his product liability loss reserve account.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a deduction for additions to a reserve for product liability losses.
